findings.details: Normalized contact links on the About page to use relative_url for consistent routing.
External links were scanned for presence only; automated link validation was not available in this run.
Added description and keywords to About, Contact, Share, and Categories pages.
Core pages have clear CTAs and structured sections; content reads well in PT-BR.

recommendations: Run an automated link checker when available to validate external URLs.
Continue adding page-specific descriptions and keywords to new pages and posts.
Review inline news images for consistent lazy-loading attributes if performance regressions appear.
